Pez Solutions

About

Pez Solutions is a sophisticated homelab environment focused on providing reliable media streaming and cloud storage services. Originally started as a project to optimize unused server capacity, it has evolved into an enterprise-grade platform spanning multiple locations.

For comprehensive technical documentation, visit our GitHub repository: pez-docs.

Infrastructure

Our infrastructure spans two primary locations (London and Copenhagen) with multiple servers per location, ensuring high availability and redundancy. We maintain a 99.9% uptime SLO.
